content.body: we really need to do something about the `NewTarget` special form
content.formatted_body: we really need to do something about the NewTarget special form

content.body: I just want to get rid of it entirely and use `GetNewTarget()` and `lexicalEnvironmentRecord.[[NewTarget]]`
content.formatted_body: I just want to get rid of it entirely and use GetNewTarget() and lexicalEnvironmentRecord.[[NewTarget]]

content.body: it's no worse than "the this value"
there's no need for the special form though
we just use hand-wavey prose to set the `[[NewTarget]]` slot, and it makes it sound like they're two distinct concepts
content.formatted_body: we just use hand-wavey prose to set the [[NewTarget]] slot, and it makes it sound like they're two distinct concepts
